meanings.definition: The activities or behavior of tycoons.
meanings.sent1: The tycooneries of the business magnate were known far and wide.
meanings.sent2: Her extravagant tycooneries attracted attention from all around.
meanings.sent3: The tycooneries of the billionaire were so grand that even the birds stopped to watch.
meanings.sent4: His tycooneries towered over the industry like mighty skyscrapers.
meanings.sent5: The tycooneries of the entrepreneur sparkled like diamonds in the sun.

meanings.definition: The qualities or characteristics of being a tycoon.
meanings.sent1: The tycooneries of leadership and vision set him apart from the rest.
meanings.sent2: She possessed the necessary tycooneries to lead the company to success.
meanings.sent3: His tycooneries shone through in every decision he made, big or small.
meanings.sent4: The tycooneries of determination and ambition fueled her rise to the top.
meanings.sent5: In his eyes, the tycooneries of success gleamed brightly.
